text: Welcome to the 60
Seconds Morning program of
Ho Chi Minh City Television and the This Morning program on
Tuesday, November 21, 2023 will have
the following notable content:
Ninh Thuan restores order  Vinh
Vinh
hi national scenic spot, culinary specialty of tree-climbing fish in the
Ca Mau cape,
temporarily angry with drunk people for resisting officers on
duty, ladies and gentlemen, Vinh Hi Bay is a
national scenic spot of Vietnam.  Ninh Thuan province is a
favorite destination of domestic and
foreign tourists, however, in
recent times, there have been many inadequacies
related to the construction and use of
land for the wrong purposes as accommodation facilities.
The People's Committee of Ninh Hai district, Ninh
Thuan province has just directed the responsible handling of
relevant parties
in the inspection of tourism services and
accommodation establishments at Vinh Hi Bay, showing that
there are many cases of land use for improper
purposes.  Many violations encroaching on
road safety corridors, many accommodation establishments,
hotels and motels, Homestays are not
qualified to operate, especially if there are
foreigners operating and living,
but the locality has not strictly managed it and
has not reported it yet.  Timely report, in addition, the
inspection conclusion also clearly shows that the floating raft houses on
Vinh Hi Bay use floating bridges for
tourism activities but cannot prove the
sea surface land lease contract. The
People's Committee of Ninh Hai district assigned
Functional departments coordinate with communes to compile
dossiers to handle cases of violations and
enforce remedial measures
while continuing to inspect and guide
tourism service establishments to supplement
related procedures.  To ensure
operating conditions in accordance with
legal regulations, at 6:00 p.m. yesterday,
Sinh Ton Island commune, Truong Sa district, Khanh Hoa province
received and provided first aid to
46-year-old fisherman Ngo Van Hai who had an occupational accident on the sea.  At
about 8:30 a.m. on the same day,
during the process of exploiting seafood in
waters about 45
nautical miles from the sea, 46-year-old Ngo Van Hai was
caught in a stone crusher, causing his
left hand to be crushed.  The tendons and bones in the hand were
bleeding profusely and were
taken to Sinh Ton Island for emergency treatment by other people on the ship.
After being examined, the Sinh Ton Island Military Hospital
performed cutting and stitching to fix the
fracture with a hand brace and stitches.  The
patient's tendons are now
stable and he continues to stay on the island
for monitoring and
treatment. To visit Ca Mau cape,
visitors can easily see a strange fish
that can swim.  In the river, they can run and
jump on land and can climb on
trees. Yes, they are mudskippers. Ca
Mau is considered the capital of mudskippers,
and when Dat Mui tourism developed,
mudskippers also became a specialty of the province.  In
this land, mudskippers often hide in the
mangrove ecosystem on coastal mudflats
along rivers. They often choose dense places to dig
burrows between the
roots of cork trees and mangrove trees, and mudskippers' burrows can
sometimes be as deep as  2 m with many nooks and crannies to
catch this fish. Fishermen often dig holes
or set up hooks during the day, shine on them at
night, or make traps filled with leaves and water, put them in their
mouths.
When I went to work, I took them down to
the mud, then in the afternoon, when I picked them up, there were
five or seven fish. The whole family lived.
Rubbish mudskippers are popular in the market with
prices ranging from 90 to 150,000 VND per kg.
However, there are also many in the area.  Many
households do the job of hunting fish during mudskippers as well
as drying fish during mudskippers. However, it is
not stable without a
brand. In recent years, mudskippers
have become known to tourists as a highlight
in their beauty.  The unique culinary culture of the
southernmost region of the country, meat and fish has a
harmonious flavor between the forest and the sea, making
people enjoy it once and remember it
forever with a beautiful shape that is quite similar to a
pine tree, so in recent years the tree  Son
Tung is popular with many people for
Christmas decorations in Sa Det flower village.
These days, the Vuong families in
Son Tung have begun exporting gold to serve the
needs of decorating the vibrant year-end festival season
for nearly 30 years.
Mr. Le Thanh Son in An Hoa ward,
Saade city, said that this year the
Son Tung consumption market has decreased significantly
compared to the same period last year because the economy has
not yet fully recovered. Selling prices of Son Tung trees have not yet fully recovered.
ranges from 100,000 to 600,000
VND for trees with a height of 0.8 m
to 1.6 m to create a beautiful pyramid shape for the
Son Tung tree. Gardeners regularly
trim the surrounding tops and fertilize the
lush green leaves to  Keeping the tree fresh for a long time
when decorating indoors requires water
around the base for about 2 to three days, so
bring the tree into the morning sunlight to help
keep the fresh green color and branches.

returned to the program with information on
security, order, and traffic safety,
ladies and gentlemen, yesterday a vehicle  The tractor overturned.
It crushed a person in Khanh
Hoi commune, U Minh district, Ca
Mau province. Initial information was at about 7 o'clock on the
same day, Mr. Tran Van Quy, 31 years old, residing in
Khanh Binh commune, Northwest Tran Van Thoi district, was
driving a motorbike.  plowing on a
piece of land in Khanh Hoi commune, U Minh district,
suddenly he lost control of the steering wheel, causing the tractor to
overturn. It fell on him, causing the victim to
die. The incident was reported to the
authorities and his family came.  Bringing
Quy's body back to the funeral home, it was learned that
Quy had just returned to work for a
tractor owner after a break of
about 2 months and had only driven two laps
when he had an
accident last night in Binh Phuoc province on a
motorbike.  crashed into the back of a car and seriously
injured a person
around 8:30 p.m. A young man about
25 years old was driving a motorbike with license plate number 9
31250 52 on road dt759
from Phuoc Long town to Binh
Duong province.  Quarter 6, Long
Phuoc ward, Phuoc Long town, the motorbike
lost control and crashed into the rear of a seven-
seater car that was going crazy. Afternoon tried to hit so
hard that the young man and the motorbike were thrown
back. The victim was seriously injured.
People were taken to the emergency room, the
cause of the accident is being investigated to
clarify that driving a car in a drunken state and
even resisting traffic police force
Nguyen Van Ngoc in Dinh
Phuoc district, Ninh province was detained by the police.
to consolidate records of handling according to
previous law provisions on the evening of November 17 on Yen Ninh
route,
Ninh Hai district traffic police discovered Ngoc
driving a motorbike with signs of being drunk, so they
issued a stop command.  The car was tested for
alcohol concentration, but Ngoc did not comply with the
order and drove the car away. The
traffic police chased and stopped
the subject. At this time, Ngoc still stubbornly did
not comply with the alcohol concentration test but also
resisted.  broke the boat and bit the thigh,
injuring a
traffic police officer at the police station. Ngoc
continued to show a defiant attitude to the
force carrying out the task of measuring
Nguyen Van's alcohol content.  Jade is 0.84
Mg per liter of breath, dozens of times higher
than the
regulation. Yesterday, Ben Tre city police temporarily
detained Nguyen Quoc Dung, residing in
Nhan Thanh commune, Ben Tre city to investigate the
act of possession.  Illegal drugs
illegal storage of guns and ammunition
Previously on November 14, Dung
and Nguyen Cong should live in Phu Nhuan commune, Nhat
city. Tre went to Nguyen Minh
Duong's house in Son Phu commune, Rong Chom district to collect
money owed here.  The subject of the
argument was immediately reported
to the police station present at the
scene. Through inspection, the police confiscated
a loaded roller gun on his person. In addition,
at the scene the police also
discovered  An electric whip, a three-
piece stick, a syringe and a
sharp knife were searched at Dung's residence. The
authorities confiscated two more homemade axes and two
knives, a baton, a can of pepper spray and
a package of drugs.  One kilogram of small cups, the
subjects admitted that Duong owed Dung
5.8 million VND after many
unsuccessful debt collection attempts. Dung and brought

paying the loan to avoid paying the
fine.  A teenager had the audacity to sneak into the
police station to take his car and was
detained. The incident happened yesterday
at the Vung Tau City Police Department, Ba
Ria Vung
Tau Province, around 7:30 a.m. yesterday.  A
traffic police team officer of
Vung Tau City Police discovered a
subject entering the temporary detention area
of ​​this team's vehicle for administrative violations
and then arbitrarily took a motorbike out
of the temporary place.  While keeping the vehicle in violation,
it was discovered that nearly a
month ago this subject had violated the
road traffic law for the first time and was
administratively fined 950,000 VND.
Most recently, on November 8, the subject
continued to violate the law.  Second offense for
driving a motorbike without a rearview mirror.
Arbitrarily changing the vehicle's settings and not obeying the
traffic police's stop order.
This time, due to lack of money to pay the fine,
the subject decided to build a tent.  Entering the

notable international news. Ladies and gentlemen,
Gaza has been completely surrounded by the Israeli army
since October 9, causing
people in the area to fall into
poverty due to lack of fuel for
cooking.  People have to look for
fuel such as
charcoal to eat, along with many families living in
War Zones. Muhammad
Samia's family hopes this stove will help them stay
warm in the coming winter. We
have no gas.  To cook water or heat,
we switched to using firewood. We
also didn't have clean water or flour all day.
We couldn't do without this stove.
Firewood is waste materials
found on the streets. This wood stove is used for
everyone.  The activity of cooking water to make gaza tea
during the rainy season makes the lives of
people here even more
difficult than the Israel-Hamas conflict that has
forced them to leave their homes or live
in temporary houses.
Napoleon Bonart's iconic hat, which he wore as
French emperor, was sold for
$2,000, a price four times higher than the
starting price on the
evening of November 19, auction house
ucena said.  The
black head of Napoleon Bonar's favorite color
on his hat with the blue, white,
red insignia of the French flag has attracted the
interest of collectors around the world.
paid up to
132,000 Euros equivalent to 2.1 million US dollars
to own the hat at an
Auction near Paris. The hat's former owner
was businessman John Louis who passed
away in 2022. Napoleon changed
this hat in  During the middle period of his reign in
France, many contemporaries wore hats
with the pointed tip facing forward,
while Napoleon often left the pointed tip facing
sideways, making it easy for soldiers to recognize him when
he went into battle. Napoleon had about 120
hats of this type.  most were lost

180-year-old amusement park.  This park has been
decorated with over 1 million
light bulbs. After only about two weeks, the
Halloween theme here has turned into a
Christmas theme. Many families in Copenhagen
often have the habit of walking and having meals
in this 82,700 square meter park.
On the first day of welcoming guests with a
Christmas theme, the park attracted a
large number of visitors despite the
wet weather. The management estimated that about
1 million visitors would come here to visit
throughout the festive season.  Chol
